author: _shemnon
content: This is not a "learn EVM" discord channel.  This is for discussing future directions.  Please redirect this discussion elsewhere, such as CryptoDevs - https://discord.com/invite/5W5tVb3

author: eyooo
content: Danno - thanks for the info. unfortunately all of the servers you have shared are generally suuuuper low quality and very difficult to talk about evm related stuff. could you recommend any other places to check out? and apologies again for off topic convo in here.

author: _shemnon
content: And you are dropping the quality of this server with off topic messages.  This is how those servers got to their state, with continual off-topic messages.  Please stick with on-topic messages.
